documents.document: I wish people who insisted that we must debate with fascists spend more timing debating fascists and less time yelling at us.
I...did not need to see that illustration of Donald Trump pregnant.
@oraymw In the future, it'd be awesome if you said "siblings," so as not to erase nonbinary people. Thanks! =]
I appreciate that blocking someone means you don't see them when quoted.
Dan Quayle is happy, at least.
@MTGAlison @OhmlessOne @OxfordHaze @dasebeleren I'm NB and ace and wanna thank you so much for representation.
@DylanZahn He's a nasty bowl of cobwebs.
@DylanZahn Is this about the HQ? I feel your pain.
@DylanZahn I'd be happy to play. I don't know how much time I have, though.
@Jamie7Keller They'll get rid of filibuster once Dems use it, whenever that is. No sense in waiting. They'll fill as many seats as possible.
Reminder that the Muslim ban is a step toward ethnic cleansing and anyone who supports it is scum.
@nostrangenames @DylanZahn I care about you, too. Do what's best for you.
Or any children. https://t.co/GujymCifFC
@_SEV8 I have no choice but to live with mine and he also is. I have no advice, but solace in knowing you aren't alone.
I'm still bitter that Clinton was denied the presidency that was rightfully hers. That is not, however, why the evil orange scares me so.
White nationalist and neo-Nazi are basically synonymous, right?
So...they're attempting ethnic cleansing. https://t.co/x460Be2C4z
Punctuation not the amphibian's strong suit. https://t.co/vx0lXi4tN5
@SallyQYates #thankyouSally keep doing what's right.
Inconclusive, but convincing. https://t.co/uGEHcmrrwW
@jlina I don't know that I know any sex workers, but it's not too unlikely.
This is so sad. https://t.co/ei56rhKK3u
@GemOfMagic I didn't think so. I twitter is my only social media vice, though, so I wasn't sure.
Is it normal for presidents to post official statements to Facebook? And not elsewhere?
@GemOfMagic She recovered, but my mom was diagnosed with cancer when I was ten. I'm here to talk if it would help.
@GemOfMagic Cancer is the worst. You have my sympathy.
@AllyEncampment Extremely low chance of that, I think.
I'm tired and anxious and angry.
Bannon backs Bannon's decision to put Bannon on the council. https://t.co/rds5O2eLdV
This is beyond inhumane. https://t.co/ddccPng9lK
@Transcrois I'm trying. Your support helps.
@nostrangenames This is so true for me, as well.
@biovisionary Congrats! That is awesome!
@Transcrois Thank you. They mean a lot.
I hate him so much. He's in favor of the Muslim ban.
Discussing the Muslim ban in terms of "expected value" is absolutely disgusting. What's wrong with people?
Apparently I've lost a lot of weight? That's bad. Ugh.
She shouldn't have to babysit Trump. https://t.co/xkYjKezlgT
@Alessandrogra51 Searched for Italian Rock music on YouTube.
Remember back when people defended Nazis' speech about "peaceful ethnic cleansing" because it couldn't happen here?
I thought Trump being Putin's puppet was bad. Being Bannon's is even worse.
@Upstreamism @senjudiciary The fact that it's almost all white men seems like a good sign for Sessions, bad for everyone else.
In case it wasn't clear, if your actions make the KKK happy, you're doing something very, very wrong.
As one of your constituents, I urge you to do something to stop this. https://t.co/klsHA0gHz8
@Jamie7Keller Sure, that's fair. I don't personally think the difference matters in practice.
@Jamie7Keller Those who no longer support him are less awful than those who still do, though. I agree with that.
@Jamie7Keller I disagree, given that the Muslim ban was part of his campaign.
@GemOfMagic Not to mention the sixteen billion eggs, anime avatars, and bots that do their bidding.
@GemOfMagic Like, seriously. Why is Richard Spencer allowed on Twitter? David Duke? Trump?!
Then DO something. https://t.co/Sv28ImbL5p
I'm so upset that I'm too sick to do anything useful today. My heart is with the protesters and the victims of this regime. #NoBanNoWall
@GemOfMagic I think they'll find a new reason to ignore you even if you adapt your speech to fit their standards. That's how it goes for me.
@GemOfMagic I'm not a woman, so take this with a grain of salt, but I think it's entirely on men that they react badly. Not women.
Steve Bannon is a Nazi. Steve Bannon is the most powerful person in the country. This is beyond the nightmare scenario
@GemOfMagic The closest one is UW and I'd rather not go there for a while. Seattle has a nice library, though.
I can't tell if I'm nauseated from rage or from the flu. Both, maybe.
Anyone know how I can find etymology of non-English words?
That's it. I will not forgive any Trump voter until they devote their life to undoing his evil. I hate fascists with every fiber of my being
I hate them so much. They're evil. They're pure evil.
I have to get off twitter for a bit. I can't handle the world. I'm too angry.
I don't think I can laugh about Trump and the GOP anymore. I just have icy hatred for all of them. The blood of innocents is on their hands.
I pray for all the victims of the Holocaust, for their families, and for the coming trials the Jewish people face.
@DylanZahn @jlina Thus far, three people voted that they have a better idea, but you're the only one to offer one. Very confusing.
My aunt is complaining about political correctness.
stuck with me, because of the racist arrogance of a white man to see a report about black people and immediately assume he knows better. 3/3
stores assumed they were there to shoplift. He said, to the TV, "Just because you say it's racial profiling doesn't mean it is." that's 2/
One time, my mom's husband was watching the news. Some black people were talking about racial profiling and how expensive department 1/
I have a fever and Age of Aquarius in my head. Pretty sure the former is causing the latter.
@oraymw I enjoyed the parable. I also do call my rep and senators, though.
I think you'd enjoy this @elektrotal. https://t.co/nc3ojAxFyB
@NoraReed How do they not??????
@woundisfertile I appreciate the concern, and I'm doing my best.
When people follow me just to get a refollow, I usually block them. Is that too harsh?
@nostrangenames @biovisionary A choice I couldn't respect more.
@nostrangenames @biovisionary Do you mean while in office? The current president has been divorced twice.
I have the flu, so all this existing I'm doing is even more exhausting than usual.
If you prick Bannon, would he bleed? Or deflate?
@Jamie7Keller Thank you!
I took a nap and wait, is it possible Bannon is going to get kicked out? This is the greatest news I've ever heard.
My aunt is mad because Michelle Obama expressed emotion at the inauguration.
@DylanZahn Seriously. If you want Dems to win, fight voter suppression, not your candidate.
@jlina You're a voice of reason.
@jlina I'm just scared that if Sessions is confirmed we lose all legal options to resist. Both my senators are Dems, though.
Whenever I get overwhelmed, I do logic puzzles until it passes. I know that's not for everyone, but maybe you should try it.
@jlina @Medium And my therapist is out of town this week and it's such a bad week for him to be gone. But I'll be okay. Thank you.
@jlina @Medium I didn't! Thank you, that has good advice. My current issues are physical, but no doubt exacerbated by emotion.
I was planning to call today, but I can barely talk I'm so congested.
Worth noting this stuff is pre-Trump. Evil is not exclusive to the new administration. https://t.co/tslGgarZOh
"Possibly." https://t.co/Md1knmojxN
@sarahkendzior But then I'd have had to watch it.
@woundisfertile Much love and support.
@jlina @HotCblog I was taught that violence was manly and that I should be manly, so it wasn't until I was aware that I took a vow of peace.
@jlina @HotCblog I've not been dedicated to pacifism as long as you, or at least didn't recognize it, but couldn't agree more.
I'm sure I've said it before, but @SonataArctica's The Ninth Hour is seriously fantastic.
@kellydigges @aquelajames @Kaus_Jason @ErikLinden That is an awesome detail.
@elektrotal I enjoyed the story.
I love you all, my Twitter pals.
I thought my glasses were giving me a headache, but now I think it's all the Nazis.
#NoBanNoWall please. Just...please. Stop being so unbelievably evil.
@DylanZahn Well, I just misunderstood how secrets worked. So we're even.
